data.name: You Suck at Parking Demo
data.detailed_description:
PARALLEL PARK INTO OUR COMMUNITY


About the Game

Are you just Drifting through life, heading towards a Burnout? Do you need to make a quick U-turn? Well, You Suck at Parking™ won’t help you at all, but it will test your parking skills to the absolute limit...and probably beyond!

IT’S ALL ABOUT THE DESTINATION!

You Suck at Parking™ is the world’s most EXTREME parking game, and the only racing game where the goal is to stop (probably).

PARK LIKE YOUR LIFE DEPENDS ON IT!

You’ll need to flex your driving skills to beat a plethora of varied and surprising levels - it’s a race against the clock for the perfect parking spot.

TAKE YOUR PARKING TO NEW LEVELS

Drive, drift, jump and teleport through a devilishly challenging solo campaign or take on a whole world of user-generated tracks.

MAKE IT OR BREAK IT!

If you’re feeling creative you can also step behind the curtain and become an architect of the Parkingverse with a fully featured level editor - build and share your own reality-bending racetrack to challenge the world!

The level editor is not included in this demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
